long_description: Sized and shaped just for kids, this saddle is built with the same comfort features as the adult saddles. A deep center groove and an anatomic cut-out in the base protects soft tissue and alleviates pelvic discomfort. A firm foundation and rubber inserts molded into the seat's base absorb shock. Soft open-cell padding is bonded to denser closed-cell foam to provide a firm foundation to support weight on longer rides. A top layer of Reactive Gel adds additional comfort.
short_description: Sized and shaped just for kids, this saddle is built with the same comfort features as the adult saddles.
